other_title: El maravillosso viaje de Nills Holgersson (Spanish)
Le Merveilleux Voyage de Nils Holgersson au Pays des Oies Sauvages (French)
le Mysterieux Voyage de Nils Holgerson au Pays des Oies Sauvages (French)
Nils Holgerssons underbara resa genom Sverige (Swedish)
plot: Nils Holgersson is a young boy on a farm who is cruel to the animals. But when he catches the farm's little goblin it becomes one prank too many. He is magically shrunk and suddenly the farm animals are out for revenge. He flees on the back of the goose Morten and they join up with a flock of wild geese. Together they travel all over Sweden, with Nils hoping to find a way to become big again.
opening_theme: "Nils no fushigi na tabi" (ニルスのふしぎな旅) by Katsumi Kahashi
ending_theme: "Itsumademo tomodachi" (いつまでも友だち) by Katsumi Kahashi
